info.title: TxtSync
info.description:
TxtSync enables applications to send and receive global SMS while tracking open rates and delivery reports. Easily make SMS part of your organisations worflow processes through TxtSync. 

Please go to https://txtsync.com/microsoft-flow for 3 simple steps on how to get up and running.  Remember to generate your Client Key and Client Secret as these are used for your Username and Password.

FromNumber.description: The Sender ID or E164 number to send from
FromNumber.title: From Number

ToNumber.description: The mobile number to send the SMS to
ToNumber.title: To Number

Direction.description: Direction of the SMS. 0 is outbound and 1 is inbound
Direction.title: Direction

Message.description: The message body of the message
Message.title: Message

CreatedDate.description: The date (UTC) of when the SMS was created
CreatedDate.title: Created Date

post.description: Sends out a single SMS to an E164 number

From.description: The Sender ID or E164 number to send from
From.title: From

Message.description: The message body of the message
Message.title: Message

To.description: The mobile number to send the SMS to, ideally this number needs to include the country code and be in E164 format
To.title: To
